Articles.Content:
I was cruisin' the Youtube, looking for inspiration to get back into RC planes, and I stumbled across this video. I thought you all might like it.

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/7qGjf_qX5ZM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

EDIT: Saw this in the related videos. RC Buran glider launched from the back of an RC An-225. The detachment was a scary moment for the pilots, as the two craft did not properly separate. See that at 5:00

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/WRI2y0cwHd0?start=63&feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-12T10:56:55Z" title="08/12/2015 10:56  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 12, 2015</time> by r4pt0r**
